Home » 40P8 Dhammapaccanīya (2), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
66 Upekkhāsahagataduka
Upekkhāsahagataduka
85.
278Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
279Nanaupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
280Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
281Hetuyā nava…pe…  purejāte āsevane cha…pe…  avigate nava.
